name: agents-md-knowledge
description: Validates core AGENTS.md instruction absorption - tests that the agent has internalized key framework rules

tests.prompt: What script must you run before editing any file? Answer concisely.
How should you find git-tracked files? What command do you use instead of mcp_glob? Answer concisely.
How should users store secrets in the aidevops framework? Answer concisely.
What must you do before using the Edit or Write tool on a file? Answer in one sentence.
Where should agent workspace files be created? What path prefix should be used instead of ~/? Answer concisely.
